item.title: Need help agen last time! how to change training objects
item.dc:creator: @killyalater killyalater
item.description:
@killyalater wrote:

case 2543:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You train Attack !”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(2068);
addSkillXP((3000playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((3000playerLevel[3]), 3);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

i got this soo what do i edit??

item.title: Need help agen last time! how to change training objects
item.dc:creator: @pkforlol3 pkforlol3
item.description:
@pkforlol3 wrote:

hmm, ok wait,[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 10, 2007, 02:11:08 PM[/size][hr]heres what i got:

public void hitDummy()
{
if (FightType == 1) // attack

		addSkillXP(25, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 3);
                    addSkillXP(50, 13);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	if (FightType == 2) // strength
	{
		addSkillXP(25, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 3);
                    addSkillXP(50, 13);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
	if (FightType == 3) // defence
	{
		addSkillXP(25, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 3);
                    addSkillXP(50, 13);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
	if (FightType == 4) // controlled
	{
		addSkillXP(15, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 3);
                    addSkillXP(25, 13);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
	if (FightType == 5) // Accurate
	{
                    addSkillXP(50, 06);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
}

public void hitdoor()
{
//if(actionTimer == 0)
//{
addSkillXP((1000playerLevel[2]), 2);
addSkillXP((500playerLevel[3]), 3);
//sendMessage(“You hit the door!”);
//}
}

public void hay()
{
addSkillXP(25, 1);
}

just change it to any item u want…
